website_summaries.verdict: This phone includes a corded base unit, two cordless handsets, and loads of features that customers of all ages will appreciate.
pros: Has 3 one-touch dial buttons and battery backup
Blocks up to 250 numbers with one touch
cons: Batteries in handsets don't hold charge for long

customer_reviews.title: Phone failed after 13 months.  Panasonic says buy another phone at full price.  Why would I do that?
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. The base unit failed after 13 months of light use -- various buttons ceased to function, including the the numbers 1, 2 and 3. I called Panasonic and they said that the 12 month warranty had expired and offered no options except to buy another phone at full price. I tried online chat, with the same result -- no support for their defective product. I will not be buying any more Panasonic products.
customer_reviews.author: LeftCoast

customer_reviews.title: Terrible update
customer_reviews.text: Sound volume on speakerphone is terrible. Also, about 30% of the time, the phone doesn't register store push buttons (e.g., press 5 for produce, press 7 to speak to customer service, etc.). On the headset speakerphone, you can barely hear the people on the other end. I wish I had the old unit back, but it didn't have Caller Blocking capabilities, which is the only thing this model has going for it. Look elsewhere, this is not a good model upgrade. That's the reason I'm writing this review, because I've only had this one for about 3-4 months and I can't stand it, so I'm looking for another phone. Going in the garbage even though it's still functioning.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P.

customer_reviews.title: Some Nice Features, But Poor Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these phones because I'd had a similar Panasonic phone system that was failing after many, many years. These phones have some nice features like the intercom and call block, however, the sound quality on the cordless handsets is very poor. I tried changing the noise reduction and volume settings, but people still say they have difficulty hearing me - I can hear them fine and they can hear me okay on the corded phone. The answering machine sound quality is ok but not great; hence the reason for only 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: My Two Cents

customer_reviews.title: This is the best household electronic/appliance purchase I have made since I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone specifically for the call-block feature, and also because I wanted to have a corded phone available.This is the best household electronic/appliance purchase I have made since I bought my first microwave oven a thousand years ago. I was becoming somewhat homicidal because of all the scam/robo calls I was receiving. This phone's call-block system has given me my power back....and puts a smile on my face every time I hit the call- block button. Good sound, easy to program.....I love this phone!
customer_reviews.author: VtaLady

customer_reviews.title: Good Luck Hearing the other person on the line
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy again. Started having issues within 3 months of having the phone. Ofcourse when the window to return closed. Frequently loses reception to base, call clarity is not great, and the call volume is low even when set to the highest level. Speaker phone is low as well... if you have kids and a loud house, good luck hearing the other person on the line.
customer_reviews.author: Beast

customer_reviews.title: So don't lay it face down and it will be a good phone
customer_reviews.text: I really like Panasonic cordless phones and I've had several generations of them. The old ones last a long time and I give them away or donate them. Panasonic makes a good phone BUT this model is not my favorite for one important reason - the talk and off buttons are too high and if you lay it face down you can turn it on accidentally. Really bad design feature. So don't lay it face down and it will be a good phone.
customer_reviews.author: Native Texan

customer_reviews.title: Purchased over a year ago, still GREAT Phones, Easy Set up
customer_reviews.text: The phone and handsets are pretty cool. I'm not super tech savvy, but I didn't have much trouble reading the instructions and plugging this in. I read several negative reviews before purchasing this about no instructions and difficulty setting up, but there were plenty of instructions and I easily set it up, including wall mounting it. The sound is very good, the handsets work fine and it does what it's supposed to! Updating to say that the phones are still doing a great job and I enjoy them so much I added an additional phone to our set. You can check the answering machine from any phone and use the phones as intercoms. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Roberts

customer_reviews.title: PHONE WITH GREAT FEATURES!!!
customer_reviews.text: This phone came with two cordless phones beside the corded one. All the features you could want including CALL BLOCKER. The only dislike I had was to make changes, you have to enter a code #. But because there are so many options to use this is the only practical way of doing it. I'D purchase it again and would advise anyone to purchase it. It is a GREAT phone for the price. (:-)
customer_reviews.author: The Mad One

customer_reviews.title: Okay product for price.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do. Wasn't happy about the quality of the product. It appears to be used or defective or something. One of the number buttons paint is smeared. See photos.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic phones
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to replace an older Panasonic phone. This newer phone can have many more on the block list. The phones have better sound quality, the caller ID screen is greatly improved and a voice announces the caller after 2 rings. The process of going through erasing calls is simpler than before. Speakerphone is clear, volume is adjustable, number of rings before voicemail starts can be extended to 7 should you need it. I wore the old version out and was looking to replace it with newer phone. I compared this with similar ones yet the Panasonic won out again.
customer_reviews.author: Flint

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for a land line.
customer_reviews.text: I live in a remote area and need a land line, I've had my old phone for many years and thought I needed an update. I probably would have given this phone 4 stars but I've noticed an echo lately. Every time I talk for more than a few minutes I hear myself, it's like an echo I don't think the person I'm talking to can hear it so it's not a huge problem. Anyhow, it's has a "call block" button which I really like.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Voice caller ID Yay!
customer_reviews.text: We Really like the phone. I brought my parents the same one for Christmas. I like the voice caller ID and it does sound louder in person than the video I posted. The only thing I would recommend with this is maybe some stick on grip pads because the cordless phones are slippery.
customer_reviews.author: grandmaknowsbest

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this phone! And I especially love pressing the button to block a call when I don't recognize a number! Our previous wall phone, and yes, I NEED a wall phone!, was over 25 years old and had almost no features. This one doesn't rest on my shoulder as well as my old phone, but it has so many features that I have forgiven that minor problem. I can record often used numbers, block almost every call that comes in, check voicemail easily, actually hear when I press speaker phone and I even have two additional phones to keep in other rooms. Plus, it's very attractive I could not be happier and I feel very "modern!"
customer_reviews.author: Bobbe P

customer_reviews.title: stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Main power base stopped working after 2 weeks. The display light started flashing and does not power on. Garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone for my 83 year old Mother. We are very happy with the purchase. More importantly I found it very easy to set up which for me is HUGE. The number display is large enough for her to read, and the number of rings is definitely long enough for her to get to the phone. The answering machine portion works great and easy to use. Storing numbers was flawless and when the phone rings it will announce the caller if it has been saved. Very happy with the purchase and would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Bettina

customer_reviews.title: Hard to hear over speaker and messages
customer_reviews.text: I returned the first phone because the speakers were terrible, and I should have returned the second one, but just got caught up in life, and forgot. After having this phone for over a year, I still regret having purchased. The playback for messages is barely audible, and the cordless phones on speaker are hard to hear too. If you're hard of hearing, do not buy these phones.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile system
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This comes with an easy to use manual. I like the voice it uses to announce calls and the ability to adjust ring volume and tone. I did put two rechargeable aaa batteries in the base. The directions say if the power goes out the phone can work up to 12 days depending on talk time which of course uses up power, but in such an emergency I have spare batteries. It can also use alkaline, nonrechargeable batteries if not connected to power. I keep both types of batteries on hand.
customer_reviews.author: consumer999

customer_reviews.title: Estatic About this Phone - except the cord going into charger can't be unplugged
customer_reviews.text: Had a Panasonic before so decided to stay with this brand. Extremely happy about the talking caller ID!!! No longer have to rush from bathroom when expecting call only to find CID indicates call is from a telemarketer. Delivery speed/accuracy great! Color - champagne worried me but not a problem - very subtle color. Only SMALL item is that unlike the model I had before, plug going into charger bases can't be unplugged which makes it awkward when trying to place charger through hole in your desk. Otherwise, extremely happy
customer_reviews.author: AJ Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for nine months and none of them work now. I do expect more from Panasonic.
customer_reviews.author: Tepozteco

customer_reviews.title: PHONE DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: Phone does not work. You really are at seller's mercy when you buy online. Product description sounds wonderful but are you guaranteed the product will function as described. No! Then the difficulty of tracking down help.
customer_reviews.author: LawLess GRACELawless Grace

customer_reviews.title: You get all that you want and more
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of research on various cordless phone models I arrived at this guy and boy did I strike it rich. Pros: -Offers wireless handsets as well as a corded phone -Numbers and display is big so you don't phone those 1-900 numbers by accident =) -Allow caller block -Reads caller identity aloud if you want -Handsets keep charge for a long time -Speaker phone is powerful Cons: -It would be preferable to raise the volume more on the corded phone (handsets are plenty loud). This isn't too bad however just wanted to note.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Genie Homeez

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but good range
customer_reviews.text: This phone was purchased to replace a Radio Shack set. This phone is similar, but the handsets are much lighter weight and a little thinner and I am having trouble getting used to this system. I like the message playback as it is easy and quick to delete messages. I can take a handset out to my husbands man cave in the backyard without the signal weakening.
customer_reviews.author: Bopbottle

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I love the large illuminated screen. Easy to see the number of the incoming or outgoing calls. Easy, intuitive interface makes it so functional, but doesn't require a manual check every time you want to do something. The speaker phone volume is great, the extensions are the right size with readable screens as well. We bought the range extender with this, although we haven't tried it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Noddimprest

customer_reviews.title: Problem Second Time😢
customer_reviews.text: I hate to write a negative review, however, we had problems with the first phone and it was replaced with no problem. Now as of Jan.1,2018 the phone (base) has quit working. I am unable to get this replaced because we are out of the return time.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this phone set - makes blocking unwanted calls SO EASY
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price. Very easy to use menu system to store unwanted call numbers, and/or has a simple one button press option on all units to block any call. We had another Panasonic unit that was 7+ yes old or more? and NEVER WORE OUT - batteries in units still recharged just fine - so I simply gave that one away when I got this one, in favor of this new call block feature. Saves a ton of money compared with similar functionality through ie an AT&T plan that would include / allow blocking unwanted calls. EXCELLENT WORK, GO PANASONIC! I would recommend this to others :)
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Great features, but not simple for the elderly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an elderly relative. She thought the call block was great, but we were hoping you could just touch one button to block the call. No, you click "Call block", then you have to click the up-arrow to highlight Yes, then click a 3rd button to select it. Three separate buttons in different places on the phone every time she wants to block a call - not easy for elderly. One feature we really liked was the ability to put phone numbers of people she knows into a group and set the ring tone to be different. So she knows by the ring if it's someone she knows calling, or not.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Roddam

customer_reviews.title: limited reception
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately we aren't very happy with this product. We have used panasonic for years but this model has a very limited distance from the base. Which is a real problem since we use it at our business. I think we will have to return it and purchase another product.
customer_reviews.author: D S

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! So many different features to enjoy, but especially the call blocking button. I like the fact that when our power goes out during hurricane season, we still have a land line that will function with the corded phone base. Sometimes cell tower coverage is sketchy, but Ma Bell always comes through in an emergency! The call clarity is great, and the answering machine has both a blinking light and an optional audible beep to alert you to new messages. Overall, great phone.
customer_reviews.author: ZanIAm

customer_reviews.title: Great phone system!
customer_reviews.text: I had an older model of the same Panasonic ( the only brand I'll buy in phones). The old one lasted for many years but this one is even better. The numbers that show on the screen are large and legible. The automated voice tells you who is calling as well as showing the number. Being able to block unwanted solicitation calls is incredible! I'm on the Do Not Call List but still get unwanted calls. I was able to program it myself because there are clear written directions included. Great phones! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: blythe212

customer_reviews.title: One phone died within a few months
customer_reviews.text: One of the handsets refuses to charge. This happened right about the time the warranty ran out. Bought in May and the magic date for getting help was July 30. What a rip off!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Winnett

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Panasonic Corded / Cordless Phone System with Answering Machine and One Touch Call Blocking last week. It arrived promptly and is the best phone I have ever owned. I arrived promptly and was packaged very well. I really like the Call Block feature so I do not have to use the separate blocker that I had been using. Installation was really easy, and the numbers and symbols are easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good Price but
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived early and pretty good price. Wish the main unit was wireless. Also not sure why 2nd and 3rd wireless phones have a charging base but also require a battery? We don’t use these phones much. Not sure if the low phone call quality is due to this phone or our cable modem phone line set up with Spectrum. Cox cable is awesome and we had no issues. Spectrum however is not that good. They were terrible as bright house and still not good as Spectrum.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!! A real Life Saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone system works great and has handset paging that you can call room to room and actually page and talk they are great for when your kids are sick at night in bed downstairs and needs you in a hurry, my son had his appendix burst and could not walk or yell, I also have a handset in my room so all he had to do was call my handset to get help... as far as I'm concerned it paid for itself right then and there... Highly recommend, especially for double level homes with kids or elderly...
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Evans Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We had bought a telephone like this one some years ago and it was excelent, good quality and all the features worked ok... That’s why We decided to buy a new one... We are so dissapointed with the new one cause the volume level is not good and the phone wireless range is so limited to no more than one room...
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Like talking in a tin can.
customer_reviews.text: I hate these phones. The wall phone isn’t bad, but the cordless phones have an echo and it sounds like I’m talking in a tin can. I’m a pretty solid Panasonic phone person and have owned several. This particular model is garbage. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger W.

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: i had bought several panasonic cordless phones before, but i got disappointed this time by this product. i use this apparel at home. the handsets started to show wearing after very short time, and minimal use. black started to show under the golden color. the ringer of the handsets started to change too. like if the speakers are malfunctioning. i do not recommend this product to anyone. panasonic is not what it used to be...
customer_reviews.author: Rayess

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PHONE
customer_reviews.text: I still have a landline phone, so having a cordless phone that I can use with a head set with it very important to me. It is more attractive than the all black phones in my opinion. I like the call block feature, the call id, last dialed numbers, etc. The sound quality is very good. This set ins located in my basement and when I move a handset to a different floor it has continued to carry the call. A five star phone. I have only had it for two months. I will try to update my review if there are any changes in function.
customer_reviews.author: dmelton

customer_reviews.title: More than a bonus, a great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item and I am more than completely satisfied with my phones! It had many features that are superb! The quality is outstanding and a great deal with many perks that you will enjoy. The sound of the ringer is loud that it is easily heard where ever you are located in the household, though the tone can be adjusted to your comfort !! Enjoy !! Thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Had Panasonic which i really liked but they eventually died. Wanted to get Panasonic again and these are great! Great quality, great sound, no feedback, very very clearness which is what is most important to me. Plus they have call block and headset jack which is hard to find these days. Great phones, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly.
customer_reviews.text: Not user friendly. Has a lot of functions but they’re buried in sub-menus. Takes forever just to delete missed calls. You have to press 3-4 buttons to see and then delete each one individually. I’m not hard of hearing but the volume isn’t very good even set on high. I have to use the speaker setting on high just to hear the caller. You have to purchase rechargeable batteries separately for the 2 cordless phones. I’ll keep it but if I find a more user friendly phone I will replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Haddad

customer_reviews.title: Better than AT&T
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our AT&T phone with these and the improvement is huge. Much of it is probably due to changing technology, not necessarily the brand, but it's much easier and quicker to see who's calling, delete robocalls, list contacts, etc., even from the child units. The screen is nice and big and easy to read for my old man eyes and the sound is clearer than the old phone or my cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Russ A.

customer_reviews.title: Phone cuts out constantly
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it works great. Looks nice. Sound is good. One big issue though - every other phone call I'm on, the phone will randomly cut out where the other person can no longer hear me. Extremely irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Abdul

customer_reviews.title: No headset jack!
customer_reviews.text: Despite various reviews that state otherwise, despite claims in the actual manual, there is no headset jack on this phone. I can't review any other aspects, as I immediately re-boxed it for return unused, but it seems like the sort of quality unit I'd expected from Panasonic... except for the missing headset jack.
customer_reviews.author: S. Reinhardt

customer_reviews.title: Voice Messages are a misery
customer_reviews.text: Based on so many good reviews, I thought I would have better luck with this phone. Overall quality is good, but the voice message sound quality is lousy. I have hearing loss and wear hearing aids, but even my husband (who often acts as my "translator" for phone conversations) is having difficulty understanding the messages. He also feels that the phone sound quality for conversing is not as good as our last phone, a Clarity which I had been greatly disappointed in all ways. Does ANYONE make a phone that has good sound quality?!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother, who is 81 with dementia. The cordless phone she was using was worn out and buttons were unclear. This set has the receiver she can just pick up, no buttons to push! The 2 additional handsets allow her to hear and answer the phone other places in her apartment. It has good sound quality first to the user and the listener. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are difficult to understand/follow.
customer_reviews.text: I returned unit because it did not keep time. I set the correct time, several times, on the base unit as well as the hand-helds, and the time on the displays continued to fall behind. Instructions are difficult to understand. Units are programmed to announce the caller's name, and I wanted to turn it off but couldn't find specific instructions to turn off this feature. There were instructions for turning it on but not for turning it off.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M Schaub

customer_reviews.title: Can't hear on these phones.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these phone sets. Pretty champagne colour and attractive looking phone. Has everything I need. The biggest downfall is the very low hearing volume. I can adjust the ringing volume but not the hearing volume. If someone can tell me how to turn up the hearing volume please tell me. Pressing the volume up while talking is not making a difference. Will have to discard these phones.
customer_reviews.author: Star Child

customer_reviews.title: Say "Goodbye Spammer"
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I'm showing my age, but I still have a land line. This phone has excellent sound quality, and the cordless units have excellent range across floors. But the most remarkable feature of this phone is the Call Block button. I never imagined a feature on a telephone would bring me inner peace, but I cannot find the words to describe the feeling of satisfaction I get every time I press the Call Block button to cut off a spam caller. Poof! The phone disconnects the call, and the spammer can't call back.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Albert

customer_reviews.title: This is a great phone system!
customer_reviews.text: This had more features then I was expecting. One was the ability to block calls and having phone remember those numbers. I purchased this phone for my business as my personal phone. I get dozens of sales calls every day and now I just hit the call block and they will never call back again.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Cauthen

customer_reviews.title: I keep setting the time once or twice a day ...
customer_reviews.text: Normally panasonic phone work fine but not these. THe indiciator said to put in rechargable batteries yet to this day they will not charge and will not ring
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Williams

customer_reviews.title: Champagne colored Version is not the same as the Black colored Version
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a Link2cell telephone system with a corded desk phone. I found the black version of this phone. When I noticed that the phone came in black and champagne, I chose champagne. However, please take note, and do not make the same mistake that I made, the champagne colored phone is for a land line only. The black version of the phone is for both land line and Link2cell.
customer_reviews.author: Fizgig

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Phone I Have Ever Had!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful-looking, light-weight, EASY to hook up after THROWING my old phone system into the GARBAGE can! I could not ask for a better- performing, easy-to-use phone for my land line. With a push of one button I can BLOCK all those political calls and other assorted poop-heads that call all day long even after reporting them to the DO NOT CALL LIST! My old lousy phone system would only block 30 calls! This phone will BLOCK 250 calls! HAHAHAHAHAHAHA! LOVE this new phone system and HIGHLY RECOMMEND it!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY A PHONE EASY TO SET UP, ATTRACTIVE, WITH CALL BLOCK FEATURE
customer_reviews.text: I returned several phones that claimed to block calls but it took 5 steps to do it. Other phones were too difficult to set up. I just wanted to be able to know who had called when I was out, how to erase calls or msgs.... the manuals were a nightmare. This Panasonic phone is gorgeous, if you want to block a button says block, to erase push that button and it is sturdy. I highly recommend it and feel I finally got what I wanted all along.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these phones for my mother in Puerto Rico and was unable to have them shipped to her so I had to resend them once i received them in California. Once my mom received them, she were unable to use one of the cordless handsets because it only included one set of rechargeable batteries even though it stated in the instructions that they included two sets. Was unable to report this until now because of just now visiting from California. Now I have to go out and buy a set of expensive batteries that should have been otherwise included. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phones with larger buttons
customer_reviews.text: These phones are great! My favorite feature is the wide variety of ring tones. I also like the back-light feature so that you can easily see who is calling. You also have a wide variety of other features like the number of rings and volume. It is very easy to operate. It's also very stylish. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: -gregg

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: My existing phones still work, I bought these for the CALL BLOCK feature. I am more than glad I did. The telemarketers only the first time. The only disadvantage is on me, I am too quick to answer a ringing phone, I wish it worked like my smartphone that blocks the call before the ring. Maybe they will upgrade that someday. My wife would also like a phone that has ringtones for certain numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L. Orlowski

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic KX-TGF352 No group silencing
customer_reviews.text: The product description, and other reviews, seem to say that the Panasonic KX-TGF352 has a physical ringer on/off switch. It doesn't. The product description and other reviews seem to say that it has a group silence feature. It doesn't. Each handset has to be individually silenced or un-silenced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good phone system with useful features
customer_reviews.text: I really like these phones -- we don't use the answering machine function, but it was easy to disable. Really like the call block function and it is easy to use. Unfortunately you have to actually answer the call before you can block the number so nuisance calls that go to voicemail can't be blocked after the fact, it seems. The call announcing gives the name if it's available, not just the number. I do use the intercom from time to time and it is a nice feature that the intercom ring is different from the incoming call ring. Overall I feel like we got a good phone system for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Crjsahm

customer_reviews.title: bad connections
customer_reviews.text: very bad connection on the cordless phones even in close range keeps disconnecting the product is not even a year old and is making terrible noise. i do not recommend this
customer_reviews.author: chana

customer_reviews.title: Phones that work as ADVERTISED!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this after a bout of trial and error on Cordless Phones. I absolutely love this phone system!! I have not had one single complaint. Sound quality is perfect. The last phone system I purchased would not always pick up the call. It would ring and ring and I would push talk over and over and... Nothing. The phone functions are easy to navigate. It also has a block function on the cordless units and its literally, a push of a button.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get this phone for my parents because they get scam calls way too often. This phone thankfully allows you to block these calls with a touch of the button. Sound is nice and clear. Easy to use phone. Great that it has two extra receivers so I can put the phone where it can be easily answered. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Himesama808

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it. Wish the sound is louder.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third or fourth Panasonic phone over many many years and is the best. What I like most about this phone is the ease of blocking spam calls. Buttons are big. The only complaint is the sound which is still low. It has been my (and others' from the comments in the review) only complaint with Panasonic phones over the years and they don't seem to listen. Other than that this phone is the best among the few brands that still exist today.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: panasonic phone
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a year and its still holding up. The volume is good, but could be a little better for elder ppl. Brought for my mom but she could hear too good when talking on the phone, so i brought a different one, but this one it good for me.
customer_reviews.author: Yoli

customer_reviews.title: Clock stopped working correctly after about 1 yr.
customer_reviews.text: No matter how frequently I reset the clock, it falls behind time rapidly, e.g., I reset it 2 days ago and it's now 55 mins behind the correct time. Often the messages left sound garbled. I had a Panasonic years ago and it didn't give me any problems. Probably won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: B.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Easy to Install, and Problem Free
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as described and was immediately unpacked and installed. It has performed admirably and has met all of our expectations over the month that it has been in operation. We have had no problems with the product at all and the documentation was easy to follow during the initial setup and programming. I read many of the other owners negative reviews to buying but none of the issues outlined have arisen with our product. I would recommend this phone to other potential buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Experienced DIY'er

customer_reviews.title: Old model Panasonic phones work better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Panasonic to replace my older Panasonic I had for over 5 years, I thought it would be a better phone with all the features however when I got the phone 9 months now and my phone rattles and I hear echo all the time this one is not a good.
customer_reviews.author: Zio

customer_reviews.title: not as good as older models
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this unit to replace my old panisonic unit because it has a call blocker feature on it. However unlike the older model if the power goes out in your house the corded unit only works if you put batteries in it. The old corded unit worked without having to install a battery in it. I also found that the volume on the speaker phone not as loud as the older model..
customer_reviews.author: Gregory L. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Setting it up was super easy.
customer_reviews.text: Panasonic products are superior quality and the price I paid on Amazon was competitive. The phone was a lot easier to set up than the previous one I had. The additional handsets were already pre-programmed to work with the base station right out of the box. There was no need to read the instructions on how to program the handsets. It is attractively finished and works exceptionally well. I hardly looked at the instructions beyond the setup diagrams. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A_Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works great at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this phone. Everything seems to work as described. Sound quality is great. Set up was as easy as following the directions. Easy to hook up with our existing telecom services. You do need to provide your own rechargeable batteries for the base unit which is a minor inconvenience and expense but no biggie.
customer_reviews.author: STraveler

customer_reviews.title: Good Reception
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a week but the quality is great, reception outside the house. A bit of a learning curve...to change some features you have to press # then a 3 digit code which is in the manual so read directions & save it. I keep one in an interior bathroom for fall risk purposes & it works great in there. So glad I went with a name I have heard of. It was $25 cheaper than Target ***It is mid June & I love these. Should have done this years ago
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Its takes care of  telemarketers and others too.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone a month now. It seems to work ok, and I love this mostly because I can press one button and block those unwanted callers...you know the ones that call up to 3-4 times per day saying the same things using many different numbers. My only problem is it announce the callers after the second ring, and I think that's a little too long to say the name but it's working fine still so I'm keeping it no problems..it's very loud too and that's good f or my husband.
customer_reviews.author: m p.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: This phone set has do many features! I have mine set up to not ring at night, but I was able to program it to allow certain numbers to ring through. You can block all of those unwanted spam calls without even answering them. Very easy to program and fantastic sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: D Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Corded/Cordless phone
customer_reviews.text: I really like the phone and the way it displays as well as not has caller id that you can read on the display, but it also says who is calling so if you are very busy, you can listen and then decide if you want to take the call. The only reason I am not giving it 5 stars is because the cord to the main phone is very very short, if one is standing when answering, it will practically lift the phone off the stand.
customer_reviews.author: B. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Many Useful Features
customer_reviews.text: Love the caller I.D. readout especially on the base unit. Also the verbal caller I.D. is a great feature as well as the call block button which remembers 250 phone numbers you never have to listen to another telemarketer. Fits perfectly on the wall and is powered by batteries or AC plug in.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set-up
customer_reviews.text: I dreaded changing phone system because I didn't want to deal with the set-up, but I ended up wishing I had done it sooner. Not only this phone system is so simple and easy to set-up but I also love the metallic shiny rose gold and white color of this phone system, which makes it look so "luxurious". The sound is really great, and blocking unwanted calls is so easy. I have always been a big fan of Panasonic phones, and hope the next time I need to replace this one it will still be around!!!
customer_reviews.author: Helene

customer_reviews.title: Reuse old handsets
customer_reviews.text: The base for my old Panasonic cordless phone system started to die. It was delightful to be able to register the old handsets with this new phone easily. I'm also looking forward to blocking a few dozen robocallers who hit us up regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone! Our 16-yr old Panasonic started to have problems, so we thought that it was time for an update. The cord on the base unit is perfect for very long calls, when you don't want to consider a battery failing on one of the satellite units. The tilting information display with large fonts is perfect for those of us needing a bigger view screen. The "call block" function is very handy for those computer generated telemaketing calls. The color and design have a light and attractive appearance. The clarity of the calls come in very well. The cord extends comfortably about three feet, some may want a longer cord.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL PHONE
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! We needed to replace our old cordless set, and I love that this had a corded piece with it. I also love that the phone yells out (ok, it just speaks it politely) who is calling, because landlines tend to get a bazillion telemarketer calls and its nice to be lazy and not get up unless it yells out someone we know instead of a random number aka telemarketer. Beautiful phone, we haven't had a problem with it at all!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Phone is not usable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for one upstairs, base in LR and other remote by my chair in living room. Base does not caller hear me, I tried mute had no affect, The remote upstairs, the ringer works but again the caller does not hear me. The second remote will not charge Never owned such a worthless phone like this one is. I am running my cell charges up because of this. I had a Panasonic previously that worked OK until it didn't It just up and died
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Madden

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this phone
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I brought this phone system from Amazon. It is very easy to set up and operate. You can easily block call and you get 2 additional phones I used in my bedrooms. Very good deal!! And very attractive system.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Large print is great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these phones for my parents who still have a land line. They love the block feature for telemarketers and the large easy to use buttons. The display also is much larger on the stationary phone. Great purchase and price for 3 phones!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Raszick

customer_reviews.title: open and test immediately. Amazon return department leaves no0 option to reach them after a small window.
customer_reviews.text: One handset works; the other doesn't. It was opened after the return window and there is no mechanism to discuss the problem with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No for Offices or loud business.
customer_reviews.text: The phone it self look nice. good quality and great coverage around the office, but there is always a background sound during the whole conversation with my patients. The office is a loud place and it doesn't block the sounds like it advertised. Not recommended for offices or loud places use. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob ZW

customer_reviews.title: requires more rechargeable batteries
customer_reviews.text: not completely satisfied. the corded base unit requires batteries to operate during a power failure, which were not supplied. in addition, even though i installed high capacity rechargeable {800 mah aaa} , they did not last very long. relatively complicated base unit, compared to previous makes i have owned. easy to read base screen
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone!
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace an older Panasonic corded/cordless phone system and picked this based on price and look. It was easy to set up and both cordless phones linked to the base without me doing a thing. I found it easy to navigate the menus and the instruction manual to turn on or off the features I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Tazman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality!! i would defiantly buy it again. I love the easy to feel buttons and knowing the numbers won’t fade on them in time is great.. The call block feature is an easy feature to use.. the speaker phone picks up from another room even when I forgot and walked abway from my phone they can still hear me lol.. I also bought the key finder and Love it. It tells you how close you are in percent measurements and beeps faster and louder.. it’s a A+ for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Quality is what I’m looking for..

customer_reviews.title: Worst phone system I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. It doesn't stay charged even for 1 day and the speaker phone on the base unit is terrible. I constantly have to repeat myself which makes it almost worthless when I am trying to filter through an automated system. I thought these phones would be good because we've had panasonic phones before and they lasted for several years and the phones stayed charged for about a week, even after using them for several hours and having them for over 5 years. I wish I would have verified how bad they were before the return window expired. I just didn't expect that these would be so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic corded/cordless phone
customer_reviews.text: So far working very well, use at home, and have a great experience with the product. I clicked on the "warranty" for a small dollar, but, almost immediately called asking for a refund even before receiving the product, as the warranty really doesn't fulfill any phone repairs given the additional price that is not clearly defined in the "warranty" itself. Phone, an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Defective item
customer_reviews.text: This was to replace an older Panasonic system; I was looking forward to using the new features. Unfortunately, one component had a manufacturing defect. I contacted Panasonic and was told to contact my vendor, who could not locate a replacement. I hold the vendor responsible.
customer_reviews.author: jswhite

customer_reviews.title: Old Phone Died
customer_reviews.text: It works...the cord on the phone was too short ordered another one. I wish I could plug a headset into the phone for hands free greater mobility. Nonetheless...happy to have a functioning phone.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Not for 2 Lines
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this phone based on the manufacturer stating it supports 2 lines - in the questions section. It does NOT support 2 lines. Once I plugged it in to test and realized it only supports 1 line it went back in the box. This did not meet the intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: TillyFatCat

customer_reviews.title: Too complex
customer_reviews.text: Overall a nice phone. I don’t like that the base is not cordless. The instructions for set up are way too complex and the features are not simple. Way too complicated and not intuitive
customer_reviews.author: Tina Lowe

customer_reviews.title: The Panasonic Corded/cordless Phone System looks very nice, professonal in my work space.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Panansonic Corded/cordless Phone System several months ago and I've had the worst experience with the phonebook menu. This menu comes on automatically, beeping , scanning and requesting to add a number to the phone book. This continues all time of night until I unplug the phone from the power strip and have left is unplugged for hours. I have called the Panasonic help desk, the representative gave me a code to enter to reset the phone, it will work for a couple of hours but starts scanning all over again until I unplug it. I'm very disappointed in this product and will not recommend it to any one.
customer_reviews.author: Pokey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome call reject
customer_reviews.text: This phone is perfect for blocking unwanted callers. It even alerts if the call is a suspected spam call. This phone works when the power goes out only if you have backup batteries in the main console. I like the call announcement feature on this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Nia K.

customer_reviews.title: My fault for waiting
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work and it is past the return date. I really had no reason to believe it would not work, so I didn't plug it in right away, we were in the middle of moving things for flooring to be placed. Very disappointed. I have tried everything, different cords, differs phone lines, different everything. It looks great but is now a great looking boat anchor!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality phone set
customer_reviews.text: Good quality phone set. Came with base and 2 additional phones. I love all the features, speaker phone and especially the call block feature. Sound quality is great. I'm rating 4 stars only because the main base hand set does not always click down all the way to hang up. You have to make sure you check it and push down to hang up. Otherwise, this phone set is much better than the old AT&T set I had. Happy overall with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: escoles

customer_reviews.title: Loved it - at first.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had bought this two years ago. Finally, enough phones. I have become a fan of speakerphones. Update. I have had this phone for two years. Today it gave me the message, 'check tel. line'. I have checked and rechecked, plugged and unplugged. Followed the troubleshooting instructions to a T. It still does not work. I gave up after 8 hours and have ordered another phone. This is disappointing. I am reducing the number of stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rivka A. Strom

customer_reviews.title: Very nice phone
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Works well for my needs. Comes with 2 cordless units, one for the kitchen and one for the bedroom. Easy to set up and the display is large and easy to read. I also like the audio caller ID which can be turned off if you choose to. I look forward to using the block caller feature on this phone. Hopefully will eliminate some of those pesky telemarketers.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: We're always losing or misplacing the cordless phones so we needed a base unit that could be answered. We opted for fewer cordless units and this base and it really works better for us. The quality is fine. I would recommend and I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MorningGlory

customer_reviews.title: Used daily for working from home
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily working from home paired with a Plantronics headset. I've recommended it to multiple coworkers who have struggled with their own phone solutions on our multiple daily conference calls. Bought in 2015 and still going strong! I dread the day I have to get a new phone...hopefully not any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Public Name

product_meta.title: PANASONIC Corded / Cordless Phone System with Answering Machine and One Touch Call Blocking – 2 Handsets - KX-TGF352N (Champagne Gold)
product_meta.description: Color:Champagne Gold| Size:2 Handsets| Style:Corded/CordlessThe Panasonic KX-TGF352N digital enhanced cordless telecommunications dect 6.0 corded / cordless phone system with caller ID and telephone answering device (TAD) works great in any home or home office. Includes one cordless handset in the base unit and two additional cordless handsets, expandable up to six handsets. Baby monitor capability is built-in, so you can keep tabs on your children in their room. If you're tired of getting interruptions from telemarketers or robo callers, this phone system has a dedicated call block button. Just press the one-touch call block and the number will be registered in the phone system’s database. Additional features include: Noise reduction, lost key finder, extended talk time, battery backup system, bi-lingual talking caller ID, 3-way conference call and two-way speaker phone on telephone's base unit and cordless handsets. Whether you're using the corded or cordless handset, this landline phone will give you everything you need in a home phone system. Guided feature tutorials are available for this corded/cordless phone system on the manufacturer’s website. Dect 6.0 is a North American marketing term for dect devices manufactured for the United States and Canada operating at 1.9 GHz. LCD language - English, Spanish.
feature_bullets: Easy to Use : Phone Base 3.4 inch high contrast LCD easily adjusts back and forth for maximum readability; Illuminated keypad & buttons are easily seen in any landline telephone lighting conditions
One Touch Telephone Call Block Register up to 250 numbers with one touch Call Block on base unit & cordless handsets; Compatible with Hearing Aid T Coil (TIA 1083 Compliant); Optional Range Extender
Powerful phone Battery Backup : With a charged cordless handset in the base unit, Enjoy up to 7 hours of talk time when the power goes out; Power source 120 Volt AC, 60 Hz

Enhanced cordless phone Sound Quality : noise reduction automatically suppresses background interference while enhancing voice tones for clearer conversation on the base unit & cordless handsets; Base unit dimensions (W x D x H) 8.7 x 6.4 x 4 inches; Handset dimensions (W x D x H) 1.8 x 1.1 x 6.6 inches; Charger dimensions (W x D x H) 2.8 x 2.8 x 1.5 inches
Built In Baby Monitor : A monitoring cordless handset in the baby’s room sends an immediate alert to the phone system’s base unit and any landline phone or cell phone; Number of phone Lines 1

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars5,295 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
